SEWA Tariff Structure

Electricity Tariff (Residential - Emirati)

Monthly Consumption (kWh) Rate (Fils/kWh)
1 - 3,000 14 fils
3,001 - 5,000 18 fils
5,001 - 10,000 27.5 fils
Above 10,000 32 fils

Electricity Tariff (Residential - Expatriate)

Monthly Consumption (kWh) Rate (Fils/kWh)
1 - 3,000 27.5 fils
3,001 - 5,000 32 fils
Above 5,000 38 fils

Water Tariff (Residential)

Consumption Category Rate
Emirati (per 1000 Gallons) AED 8.00
Expatriate (per 1000 Gallons) AED 15.00

Additional Information

  • Service fees may apply
  • Municipality fees: 10% of electricity and water charges
  • Sewerage charge: 50% of water consumption charge
  • Rates subject to change by SEWA authority
